articles.title: Landmark Data: The Euclid Telescope Begins Mapping the Dark Matter - NDTV
articles.description: The Euclid space telescope, launched by the European Space Agency, is making significant strides in mapping dark matter and dark energy. Recent images reveal stunning celestial objects, including galaxy clusters like Abell 2390 and star nurseries lik
articles.content:
Euclid's observations provide crucial insights into the universe's mysteries.
